metadata.title: CVE-2021-21775 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A use-after-free vulnerability exists in the way certain events areprocessed for ImageLoader objects of Webkit WebKitGTK 2.30.4. A speciallycrafted web page can lead to a potential information leak and furthermemory corruption. In order to trigger the vulnerability, a victim must betricked into visiting a malicious webpage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-21775` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
qtwebkit-source package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
